name: HH_EPSD_HC_ADDRESS
description: This table contains home care address information for Home Health episodes. This information is user-entered either as part of the Intake encounter or on the Remote Client in the Address Book task.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HOME_CARE_ADDR
columns.description: Home care address typed in by a user for the episode.
